Html:
Hi, 

I need to have source type"Standard" ho to add it to the list? There is 

<source type="Standard">        <column id="1">          <halign>centre</halign>          <valign>centre</valign>

but when I add New Source there is no this type of source

Thank you in advance!

There is no source type standard. Check the first page of the documentation to get a list of the official 17 available types.

It is possible to have a Standard source type but it requires some changes to other files as well. If you plan on deploying the style to other users, I would advise against it. Just do a search on this forum, it contains a full explaination on this topic.
